name: cordova-plugin-advanced-http
summary: Cordova / Phonegap plugin for communicating with HTTP servers.  Allows for SSL pinning!
description:
Cordova / Phonegap plugin for communicating with HTTP servers. Supports iOS, Android and Browser.

This is a fork of https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/cordova-HTTP Cordova-HTTP plugin.
